name: Falling Together
description:
How to Play:

  • Left and Right arrows keys or “A” and “D” to move the player
  • Avoid obstacles to reach the end of each stage.

Falling Together takes the player through a series of stages to find and collect their companions. These companions combine with the player so they can fall together and bring colour, truth and positivity to the monochrome world they inhabit.

Spreading colour and sharing the rainbow is the ultimate goal for our hero and the companions. Achieving this task surely shows that there really is strength in numbers.
